languages.text: "Вижу, вы уже все разнюхали? Так и есть, я родился и вырос на Идексе, в лучшем из имперских миров! Никогда не забуду этот ансамбль из пластали и ферробетона, сияние гордых шпилей — и вечное унижение своим... назначением".
languages.translation_comment: в это время Глейто продвигается немного вперед

traits.locale_text: "Вижу, вы уже все разнюхали? Так и есть, я родился и вырос на Идексе, в лучшем из имперских миров! Никогда не забуду этот ансамбль из пластали и ферробетона, сияние гордых шпилей — и вечное унижение своим... назначением". {n}Губернатор выплевывает это слово с нескрываемым отвращением.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor_Buffoon

languages.translation_comment: в это время Глейто продвигается немного вперед

languages.text: "I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."
languages.original_text: "Вижу, вы уже все разнюхали? Так и есть, я родился и вырос на Идексе, в лучшем из имперских миров! Никогда не забуду этот ансамбль из пластали и ферробетона, сияние гордых шпилей — и вечное унижение своим... назначением".

traits.locale_text: "I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."

"I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."

"I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."

"I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."

"I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."

languages.text: “这一点你不是早就知道了吗？没错，我出生在艾德克斯，在那里长大成人，那里是整个帝国最伟大的世界！我永远不会忘记塑钢与钢筋混凝土的绝景，高耸尖塔之上的明光……以及我永远的耻辱……这场任命。”
languages.original_text: "I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."

traits.locale_text: “这一点你不是早就知道了吗？没错，我出生在艾德克斯，在那里长大成人，那里是整个帝国最伟大的世界！我永远不会忘记塑钢与钢筋混凝土的绝景，高耸尖塔之上的明光……以及我永远的耻辱……这场任命。”

languages.text: «Veo que ya me tenía calado, ¿eh? ¡En efecto, provengo de Idex, el mejor planeta de todo el Imperium! Jamás olvidaré ese batiburrillo de plastiacero y ferrocemento, el brillo de sus orgullosas torres... ni la eterna humillación de mi nombramiento».
languages.original_text: "I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."

traits.locale_text: «Veo que ya me tenía calado, ¿eh? ¡En efecto, provengo de Idex, el mejor planeta de todo el Imperium! Jamás olvidaré ese batiburrillo de plastiacero y ferrocemento, el brillo de sus orgullosas torres... ni la eterna humillación de mi nombramiento».

languages.text: "Beni çoktan çözdüğünü görüyorum? Doğru, tüm İmparatorluk'taki en büyük dünya olan İdex'te doğup büyüdüm! Plaçeliğin ve demirtonun karışımını, gururlu kulelerin parıltısını asla unutmayacağım. Atanmamın sonsuz aşağılanmasını da."
languages.original_text: "I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."

traits.locale_text: "Beni çoktan çözdüğünü görüyorum? Doğru, tüm İmparatorluk'taki en büyük dünya olan İdex'te doğup büyüdüm! Plaçeliğin ve demirtonun karışımını, gururlu kulelerin parıltısını asla unutmayacağım. Atanmamın sonsuz aşağılanmasını da."

languages.text: 「すでに俺が誰だか分かっているんだろう？その通り、俺はイデックスで生まれ育った。それは帝国の中で最も素晴らしい惑星だった！プラスチールとフェロクリートの混じった壮大な尖塔の輝きを忘れないだろう。そして、永遠の恥である俺の任務のことも…」
languages.original_text: "I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."

traits.locale_text: 「すでに俺が誰だか分かっているんだろう？その通り、俺はイデックスで生まれ育った。それは帝国の中で最も素晴らしい惑星だった！プラスチールとフェロクリートの混じった壮大な尖塔の輝きを忘れないだろう。そして、永遠の恥である俺の任務のことも…」

languages.text: « Je vois que vous m'avez déjà démasqué. En effet, je suis né et j'ai grandi sur Idex, la meilleure planète de tout l'Imperium ! Je n'oublierai jamais ce mélange de plastacier et de ferrobéton, l'éclat des tours, et l'humiliation éternelle de ma... nomination. »
languages.original_text: "I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois que vous m'avez déjà démasqué. En effet, je suis né et j'ai grandi sur Idex, la meilleure planète de tout l'Imperium ! Je n'oublierai jamais ce mélange de plastacier et de ferrobéton, l'éclat des tours, et l'humiliation éternelle de ma... nomination. »

languages.text: "Ah, Ihr seid mir also schon auf die Schliche gekommen, ja? Ja, ganz richtig, ich bin auf Idex aufgewachsen, der größten Welt im gesamten Imperium! Ich werde diese Mischung aus Plaststahl und Ferrobeton niemals vergessen, das Glitzern der stolzen Türme ... und die ewige Blamage meiner ... Ernennung."
languages.original_text: "I see you've already found me out, eh? That's right, I was born and raised on Idex, the greatest world in all the Imperium! I'll never forget that mix of plasteel and ferrocrete, the glitter of proud spires — and the eternal humiliation of my... appointment."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, Ihr seid mir also schon auf die Schliche gekommen, ja? Ja, ganz richtig, ich bin auf Idex aufgewachsen, der größten Welt im gesamten Imperium! Ich werde diese Mischung aus Plaststahl und Ferrobeton niemals vergessen, das Glitzern der stolzen Türme ... und die ewige Blamage meiner ... Ernennung."
